articles.author: Ronny Reyes
articles.title: Mystery cargo-plane fires linked to Russian plot to plant bombs on aircrafts: officials - New York Post
articles.description: A series of mystery fires that broke out at European cargo hubs in July have been linked to a covert Russian plot testing the best way for Moscow to plant bombs on US-bound cargo planes, Western of…
